mapper.select: SELECT m.memberNo, memberId, memberNickname, memberPwd, memberEmail, memberSocial, available FROM member m JOIN member_detail md ON m.memberNo = md.memberNo WHERE memberId = #{memberId}
SELECT m.memberNo, memberId, memberNickname, memberPwd, memberEmail, memberSocial, available FROM member m JOIN member_detail md ON m.memberNo = md.memberNo WHERE memberEmail = #{memberEmail}

SELECT m.memberNo, memberId, memberNickname, memberPwd, memberEmail, memberSocial, available FROM member m JOIN member_detail md ON m.memberNo = md.memberNo WHERE memberId = #{memberId} AND memberPwd = #{memberPwd} AND available = 1
mapper.update: INSERT ALL INTO member(memberNo, available) VALUES(#{memberNo}, 1) INTO member_detail(memberNo, memberId, memberNickname, memberPwd, memberEmail, memberSocial) VALUES (#{memberNo}, #{memberId}, #{memberNickname}, #{memberPwd}, #{memberEmail}, #{memberSocial}) SELECT * FROM dual
